reviews.text: We stayed at Sunset Bay Hotel over the new year 2008-2009 what a welcome we recieved when we arrived tea, coffee, and fresh cream cakes, our host julie and her daughter were fantastic,nothing was to much trouble for them.Evening meals were available if required and were very good and exelent value for money.Mulled wine and snacks were laid on all free of charge before we went out on new years eve,we have booked again for this year,and would recomend this b&b to anyone.
reviews.title: Perfect place to stay,fantastic hosts,

reviews.text: Just stopped the one night mid week. We wanted to take my parents back to Weston, they haven't been for many years and this proved the perfect place to stop. Easy to park. Very friendly welcome from Julie, lovely home made scones and tea, just what we needed after a 2.5 hour drive. Nice to relax in the lounge with a lovely view over the beach, before we set off to explore Weston. Rooms were well equiped and spotlessly clean. Very comfy beds. Fantastic breakfast. This is a real home-from-home and we will definitely be returning. Excellent value for money. Perfectly situated. Why stop anywhere else when you can get accommodation this good for this price.
reviews.title: Just Perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just back from a mid week break in windy Weston and having booked this hotel strictly on reviews given by others i can confirm they were all telling it as it is. Julie is the perfect hostess and a demon workaholic. Was great to be greeted on arrival with a cup of real tea ( strong and tasty but with water on the side for wimps) and home made cakes still hot from the oven. The room was fresh and clean with a superb view of the beach. The en suite was compact but only because i am larger than normal, be fine for most. Breakfast was as expected, faultless. It was also nice to be asked what we wanted rather than just presented with the "full English". Parking was ok on the street and free but there was space provided for three cars on the hotel front. Weston itself at this time of year is not at its best mid week with lots of shops/restaurants shut till the weekend. The new pier is well worth a visit.
reviews.title: Superb
